function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High potential for disease transmission in crowded health club facilities","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases among users, leading to illness and potential public health crisis","Mitigation":"Regular sanitation, hygiene protocols, and ventilation systems to reduce disease transmission","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection systems, touchless fixtures","People":"Health club users, staff, and visitors","Owner":"Health club management and staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate maintenance leading to unsanitary conditions","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised health and safety of users","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning, maintenance schedules, and staff training on sanitation procedures","Technologies":"Cleaning robots, automated maintenance systems, remote monitoring tools","People":"Health club users, staff, and visitors","Owner":"Health club management and maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Lack of compliance with health and safety regulations","Impact":"Potential legal consequences, fines, and reputation damage for the health club","Mitigation":"Regular audits, training on regulations, and implementation of safety protocols","Technologies":"Compliance management software, automated auditing tools, digital documentation systems","People":"Health club owners, management, and staff","Owner":"Health club management and legal compliance team"}]}
